text:
catu#Shpada Eqva paqSUna#va rundhEq dvE utta#rE dviqpada# EqvAva# rundhE &nuqShTuBa#maqBi saM pA#dayantiq vAgvA a#nuqShTup tasmA$t prAqNAnAqM ~MvAgu#ttaqmA sa#mayAviShiqtE sUryE# ShODaqSina#H stOqtra-muqpAka#rOtyEqtasmiqn 
vai lOqka indrO# vRuqtrama#hanth sAqkShAdEqva vajraqM BrAtRu#vyAyaq pra ha#ra-tyaruNapiSaq~ggO&SvOq dakShi#Naiqtadvai vajra#sya rUqpa(gm) samRu#ddhyai || 43
(lOqkO - viqduSha#H ShODaqSI gRuqhyatEq - yaduqkthyE# - dhAma# - kalpayanti - saqptaca#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A11)

Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- 
(suqvaqrgAyaq yad dA$kShiqNAni# - samiShTa yaqjU(gg) - Shya#vaBRutha yaqjU(gm)Shiq - sPyEna# - praqjApa#tirEkAdaqSinIq - mindraqH patni#yAq - Gnanti# - dEqvA vA i#ndriqyaM ~MvIqrya#M - dEqvA vA adA$ByE - dEqvA vai praqbAhu#k - 
praqjApa#tirdEqvEByaqH sa ri#ricAqnaH - ShO#DaSaqdhaikA#daSa)

Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 Series of Panchaatis :-
(suqvaqrgAya# - yajati praqjAH - sauqmyEna# - gRuhNIqyAt praqtya~jca#M - gRuhNIqyAt praqjAM paqSUn - trica#tvAri(gm)Sat)

First and Last Padam of sixth Prasnam of 6th Kandam :-
 (suqvaqrgAyaq - vajra#sya rUqpa(gm) samRu#ddhyai)

Kaanda Korvai with starting Padams of 6 Prasanams of Kandam 6
(prAqcIna#va(gm)SaqM - ya - ccAqtvAlA$ - dyaqj~jEnE - ndra#H - suqvargAyaq - ShaT )

|| hari#H OM ||

|| kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM ShaShThakANDE ShaShThaH praSnaH samAptaH ||

|| iti ShaShThaM kANDaM ||
========================
